resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Scholar, you know the letters of the Greeks by their shapes.
resource.chars: Scholar, you know the letters of the Greeks by their shapes.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The verse used here by the scribe allows to connect this manuscript to Basel, UBB A.VII.3.
